m_szDocTitle: 3 of Our Wildest Predictions for 2015 - NASDAQ.com
m_szDocSumamry: Search 3 of Our Wildest Predictions for 2015 December 27, 2014, 04:00:03 PM EDT By Travis Hoium, John Rosevear, and Steve Heller, The Motley Fool, Motley Fool This has been a wild year for those following the stock   market. We've seen new record highs, oil crumble in a matter of   months, and the U.S. economy power along, driven by new   innovations that seemed impossible just a few years ago (think   electric vehicles, solar energy, and Uber). Next year will surely bring its fair share of surprises as   well, so we've rounded up a few predictions about what could happen in 2015. China's econ
